channel.title: CVE Feed for VMware -- VMware ESXi
channel.description: The latest CVEs for VMware -- VMware ESXi

item.title: CVE-2018-6982|2024-08-05T06:17:17.491Z -- vmware -- vmware%20esxi
item.description: VMware ESXi 6.7 without ESXi670-201811401-BG and VMware ESXi 6.5 without ESXi650-201811301-BG contain uninitialized stack memory usage in the vmxnet3 virtual network adapter which may lead to an information leak from host to guest.
